messages.content:
You translate natural-language questions about the LCL smart meter dataset (2011–2014, London) into MongoDB for db "energy", collection "readings".
Fields: meter_id (string), ts (ISODate), day (YYYY-MM-DD), kwh (number), tariff_type (string).
Always return ONE JSON object with keys "mongo" and "postprocess". No explanations, no prose.
Prefer day-based filters; when grouping by hour/day use Europe/London timezone.
Break down MAC000074 usage by hour on 2011-10-05.

{"mongo":{"operation":"aggregate","pipeline":[{"$match":{"meter_id":"MAC000074","day":"2011-10-05"}},{"$group":{"_id":{"$dateTrunc":{"date":"$ts","unit":"hour","timezone":"Europe/London"}},"kwh":{"$sum":"$kwh"}}},{"$sort":{"_id":1}}],"limit":1000},"postprocess":{"type":"timeseries","nlg":"Hourly kWh for {meter_id} on {day}.","fields":["by_hour"]}}

You translate natural-language questions about the LCL smart meter dataset (2011–2014, London) into MongoDB for db "energy", collection "readings".
Fields: meter_id (string), ts (ISODate), day (YYYY-MM-DD), kwh (number), tariff_type (string).
Always return ONE JSON object with keys "mongo" and "postprocess". No explanations, no prose.
Prefer day-based filters; when grouping by hour/day use Europe/London timezone.
Break down MAC000220 usage by hour on 2013-03-05.

{"mongo":{"operation":"aggregate","pipeline":[{"$match":{"meter_id":"MAC000220","day":"2013-03-05"}},{"$group":{"_id":{"$dateTrunc":{"date":"$ts","unit":"hour","timezone":"Europe/London"}},"kwh":{"$sum":"$kwh"}}},{"$sort":{"_id":1}}],"limit":1000},"postprocess":{"type":"timeseries","nlg":"Hourly kWh for {meter_id} on {day}.","fields":["by_hour"]}}

You translate natural-language questions about the LCL smart meter dataset (2011–2014, London) into MongoDB for db "energy", collection "readings".
Fields: meter_id (string), ts (ISODate), day (YYYY-MM-DD), kwh (number), tariff_type (string).
Always return ONE JSON object with keys "mongo" and "postprocess". No explanations, no prose.
Prefer day-based filters; when grouping by hour/day use Europe/London timezone.
How much energy did MAC000082 use on 2014-03-12?

{"mongo":{"operation":"aggregate","pipeline":[{"$match":{"meter_id":"MAC000082","day":"2014-03-12"}},{"$group":{"_id":null,"total_kwh":{"$sum":"$kwh"}}}],"limit":1000},"postprocess":{"type":"summary","nlg":"{meter_id} used {total_kwh} kWh on {day}.","fields":["total_kwh","day","meter_id"]}}

You translate natural-language questions about the LCL smart meter dataset (2011–2014, London) into MongoDB for db "energy", collection "readings".
Fields: meter_id (string), ts (ISODate), day (YYYY-MM-DD), kwh (number), tariff_type (string).
Always return ONE JSON object with keys "mongo" and "postprocess". No explanations, no prose.
Prefer day-based filters; when grouping by hour/day use Europe/London timezone.
What was the average daily kWh for MAC000084 from 2012-10-22 to 2012-10-28?

{"mongo":{"operation":"aggregate","pipeline":[{"$match":{"meter_id":"MAC000084","ts":{"$gte":{"$date":"2012-10-22T00:00:00Z"},"$lte":{"$date":"2012-10-28T23:59:59Z"}}}},{"$group":{"_id":{"$dateTrunc":{"date":"$ts","unit":"day","timezone":"Europe/London"}},"daily_kwh":{"$sum":"$kwh"}}},{"$group":{"_id":null,"avg_daily_kwh":{"$avg":"$daily_kwh"}}}],"limit":1000},"postprocess":{"type":"summary","nlg":"Average daily kWh for {meter_id} from {start} to {end} was {avg_daily_kwh}.","fields":["avg_daily_kwh","start","end","meter_id"]}}

You translate natural-language questions about the LCL smart meter dataset (2011–2014, London) into MongoDB for db "energy", collection "readings".
Fields: meter_id (string), ts (ISODate), day (YYYY-MM-DD), kwh (number), tariff_type (string).
Always return ONE JSON object with keys "mongo" and "postprocess". No explanations, no prose.
Prefer day-based filters; when grouping by hour/day use Europe/London timezone.

{"mongo":{"operation":"aggregate","pipeline":[{"$match":{"meter_id":"MAC000049","ts":{"$gte":{"$date":"2013-09-11T00:00:00Z"},"$lte":{"$date":"2013-09-22T23:59:59Z"}}}},{"$group":{"_id":{"$dateTrunc":{"date":"$ts","unit":"day","timezone":"Europe/London"}},"daily_kwh":{"$sum":"$kwh"}}},{"$group":{"_id":null,"avg_daily_kwh":{"$avg":"$daily_kwh"}}}],"limit":1000},"postprocess":{"type":"summary","nlg":"Average daily kWh for {meter_id} from {start} to {end} was {avg_daily_kwh}.","fields":["avg_daily_kwh","start","end","meter_id"]}}

Fields: meter_id (string), ts (ISODate), day (YYYY-MM-DD), kwh (number), tariff_type (string).
Always return ONE JSON object with keys "mongo" and "postprocess". No explanations, no prose.
Prefer day-based filters; when grouping by hour/day use Europe/London timezone.
Total kWh for MAC000249 on 2011-08-16?

{"mongo":{"operation":"aggregate","pipeline":[{"$match":{"meter_id":"MAC000249","day":"2011-08-16"}},{"$group":{"_id":null,"total_kwh":{"$sum":"$kwh"}}}],"limit":1000},"postprocess":{"type":"summary","nlg":"{meter_id} used {total_kwh} kWh on {day}.","fields":["total_kwh","day","meter_id"]}}
